header.title: Software design and development for digital transformation
header.block1: Sunesis offers full advisory, mentoring and operational support (software development outsourcing) to enterprises in the process of digital transformation.
header.block2: We help companies become or stay exceptional with leveraging new technologies, constant innovating, employing fast development cycles and creating better customer experience.

servicerange.title:
With full range of our services
we fasten your digital transformation

box.tacplan: Digital transformation tactical plan with identified new digital products and solutions
box.dev: Rapid development of new digital products and suggestions

servicerange.body: Based on the strategic digital transformation goals we help enterprises to prepare a solid tactical digital transformational plan with identified core new digital products and services. In the next step, we help companies with re-platforming existing software and applications that are outdated, we modernize legacy code and introduce new modern technologies to rapidly develop new digital solutions.

summary.normal: With our wide-range capabilities, cloud specialization, our Kumuluz digital platform and agile practices we help enterprises
summary.emphasized: shorten the digital transformation cycle up to 85%.

capabilities.title: Our capabilities
capabilities.intro: We offer a wide range of IT consulting, training and software development services that help enterprises with faster digital transformation, transition to cloud, transition from monolithic to microservice architecture, software modernization and new digital products development.
capabilities.outro: We are constantly developing new capabilities according to new technology trends, emerging technologies, and best development practices, like microservices, blockchain, IoT and others.

certifications.title: Our certifications
certifications.body: We've received several international awards and certifications from global technology leaders like IBM, Oracle, Java Community and others.

servicelist.title: Full list of our services and capabilities
servicelist.desc: Here you can find the full list of our services and capabilities on a strategic, tactical and operational level that we offer primary to enterprises in pretension industries like automotive, financial services, energy, oil&gas, government, media, retail and telco.

digital-transformation-services.title: Digital Transformation Services
digital-transformation-services.desc: We offer full digital transformation services from preparing a strategy and tactical plan to identifying and outlining new digital products and services. In the next step we help enterprises to develop new digital products and services and to continuously deliver new and advanced features for their stakeholders.
digital-transformation-services.item-1: Consulting and mentoring for digital transformation projects
digital-transformation-services.item-4: Planning and architecture for digital products/services
digital-transformation-services.item-5: Rapid development and implementation (complete solution) with extremely fast time-to-market
digital-transformation-services.item-7: Build-in customer engagement tools - sense your customer needs and respond immediately
digital-transformation-services.item-8: Advanced digital technologies - microservices, APIs, containers, blockchain
digital-transformation-services.item-9: Continuous delivery of new and advanced features, including DevOps

cloud-native-microservices-apis.title: Cloud-native, microservices and APIs
cloud-native-microservices-apis.desc: Cloud-native application development, microservice architecture and APIs are our core capability and competitive advantage. We help enterprises with the transition to the cloud and microservices, including replatforming existing applications to developing new cloud-native based solutions.

upper-left.title: Cloud Native
upper-left.item-4: Config and discovery servers: Etcd, Consul, etc
upper-left.item-5: Central logging: Elastic (ELK) stack, Fluentd, etc

upper-right.title: Transition to the Cloud
upper-right.item-1: Consulting and mentoring with the transition to the cloud
upper-right.item-3: Skilled for SAP Hana Cloud Platform
upper-right.item-4: Skilled and certified for Microsoft Azure
upper-right.item-5: Skilled and certified for IBM BlueMix
upper-right.item-6: Skilled and certified for Oracle Cloud

lower-left.title: Microservices
lower-left.item-4: Best practices and patterns for microservices
lower-left.item-5: Microservices frameworks for Java, .NET, Node.js and Go
lower-left.item-6: Microservice frameworks for Java (KumuluzEE, Spring Boot/Cloud, WildFly Swarm, Liberty, etc.)

docker-and-kubernetes.title: Docker and Kubernetes et al.
docker-and-kubernetes.desc: We’re experts at modern software packaging solutions that provide resilience, scalability, predictability, immutability and repeatability of running digital services and solutions, independently of particular infrastructure.

integration.title: Integration
integration.desc: With integration solutions, we help enterprises to bring all data to one place from any source - for analytics, smart data, synchronization or other purposes.
integration.item-1: Integration of applications, IoT and back-end systems
integration.item-2: From point-to-point integration to loosely-coupled hub-based integration

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.desc: We’ve specialized for the design and development of blockchain applications and solutions. As our contribution to the blockchain world, we’ve developed Kumuluz.io the next generation API platform for blockchain applications.

javaee-architecture-development.title: Java, Java EE/Jakarta EE/EE4J architecture and development
javaee-architecture-development.desc: We offer high-quality back-end development based on our extensive expertise in enterprise software development and general software design patterns. We’re specialized for Java back-end development.
javaee-architecture-development.item-1: Extensive, in-depth Java and Java EE/Jakarta EE/EE4J expertise
javaee-architecture-development.item-2: Long year experience with most complex Java EE projects
javaee-architecture-development.item-3: Certified for IBM WebSphere and Oracle WebLogic
javaee-architecture-development.item-4: Fully skilled for JBoss and WildFly
javaee-architecture-development.item-5: Migration of Java EE application to microservices and the cloud

mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.title: Mobile UX and HTML5 responsive web development
mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.desc: Besides back-end development, we cover front-end development, based on HTML5 and popular frameworks like Angular and React. We’re highly skilled in mobile development.
mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.item-2: Highly skilled for HTML5 client-side development
mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.item-5: Highly skilled for mobile development: iOS and Android
mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.item-6: Native and hybrid mobile development (Cordova, Ionic)

devops-and-cd.title: DevOps and Continuous Delivery
devops-and-cd.desc: All of our development processes are based on agile and DevOps best practices and principles, which provides fast development cycles, process automation, easy monitoring of development progress and most importantly continuous releases of new software features.
devops-and-cd.item-5: Installation and configuration of DevOps environments

bpm.title: BPM
bpm.desc: We have an expert team for business process management (BPM) with the expertise to identify, analyze measure and optimize processes, including the development of new process applications and data integration. We’re certified for several BMP suits.
bpm.item-3: Integration process applications with back-end services
bpm.item-4: Highly-skilled and certified for IBM BPM, Oracle SOA and BPM Suite and JBoss jBPM with an extensive track record

ai.title: Unlock innovation, efficiency and growth with AI and GPT
ai.block1: In today's rapidly evolving digital world, the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) and generative pre-trained transformers (GPT) models into enterprise applications is not just an option, but a powerful competitive advantage.
ai.block2: We specialize in embedding cutting-edge AI technologies into your existing enterprise applications by leveraging Open AI services, including OpenAI's GPT models, AI search and others.

servicerange.title: Grow  and optimize your business with robust, scalable and secure AI solutions tailored to the unique challenges of your industry

efficiency.title: Increase efficiency
efficiency.description: Automate repetitive tasks and optimize your processes

decision-making.title: Improve decision making
decision-making.description: Leverage AI insights for smarter strategies

experiences.title: Personalize experiences
experiences.description: Deliver customized content to delight users

advantage.title: Gain competitive advantage
advantage.description: Stay ahead with cutting-edge AI technology

services.title: Our technical capabilities
services.subtitle: We develop effective cloud-native solutions with optimized architectures for scalability and high performance. In addition, we implement cost-efficient strategies to make AI and GPT integration sustainable for your business.

integration.title: Seamless GPT integration
integration.subtitle: with form-based applications
integration.description: We enrich traditional and advanced form interfaces with GPT-powered conversational elements such as intelligent autofill and real-time help to optimize data entry and improve user interaction without losing familiarity.

openai.title: with OpenAI
openai.description: We build scalable, modular AI architectures with efficient API management, reduced latency through caching and network optimization, and flexible scaling through Azure infrastructure.

security.title: Improved data
security.subtitle: and document security
security.description: We secure your sensitive data through advanced encryption, strict access controls and compliance with regulations such as GDPR, DORA and HIPAA to minimize risk and give you peace of mind.

items.item-5: Privately hosted or local AI, GPT and LLM models

scalability.title: and cost control
scalability.description: We proactively monitor resources, intelligently manage costs to keep operations within budget, optimize AI models for faster performance and leverage serverless computing for automatic scaling and cost savings.

table.left: Development of new AI applications for your business
table.right: Integrations in your existing enterprise applications
